name: George Okereka
intro: Focused on creating amazing UIs to solve business problems around the globe. I am participating in Hackathons and solving problems to build something cool and useful for the world.
about: I am a full-stack web developer who loves to design and develop beautiful websites. I have been coding react websites for over a year now and have being enjoying every part of my journey. I love documenting my journey by writing blog posts and teaching others through my writing.

projects.name: Neochildcare
projects.about: Neo Childcare is transforming how healthcare benefits mothers and children in Nigeria and Africa, allowing for easy access to healthcare services and products.

projects.name: Nolimitwash
projects.about: Nolimitwash helps to bring together car rental companies, car wash operators and individual car owners into one single marketplace.

testimonials.value: George is a very fast learner and is a very sincere individual. He explores new technologies and is unafraid of trying our things.George on React JS and Next JS and demonstrated good business understanding apart from the programming and user skills.
testimonials.name: Favour Adeboye

testimonials.value: George is an amazing web developer! He has created many dope websites. I have personally worked on a project with him and the experience was amazing as he learned some new things from and even I learned some new things from George
testimonials.name: Prashoon Bhatacharjee

testimonials.value: George is a very talented, helpful and a kind person. I can approve of his react skills as he has helped me and a lot of people in the community while they face issues, he is an active blogger and has written really useful articles in web development field.
testimonials.name: Ashutosh Pandey
